page.title: 13PORTHCAWL-Pedestrianisation
page.content: In 1985 the Ogwr Borough Council organised a local project with the schools in Porthcawl. They intend to pedestrianise the main shopping centre and asked the schools to design ideas that they felt would be suitable for a precinct.The schools came up with some excellent suggestions and all involved worked extremely hard.On 8th July 1985 all the models and maps were displayed for the public in the main hall of the Grand Pavilion.We learned a lot about our town and about Town and Country Planning in our area.Eventually when the Borough Council do pedestrianise the centre we,the children of Porthcawl,will be eagerly awaiting the features of the new precinct,wondering what part of our project,if any,will be used.
